summary: This document consists of email correspondence between Lesley Groff and Amanda Kirby regarding scheduling a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein. The emails discuss potential changes to the meeting time originally set for 10 AM on September 6, 2013.

persons.name: Lesley Groff
persons.context: Lesley Groff is coordinating a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein and is in communication with Amanda Kirby about rescheduling.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is responding to Lesley Groff's request regarding the meeting with Jeffrey Epstein and is checking with other attendees.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the individual for whom the meeting is being scheduled, and he has requested a change in the meeting time.

connections.description: Lesley Groff and Amanda Kirby are collaborating to schedule a meeting involving Jeffrey Epstein.
Lesley Groff is coordinating a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein.
Amanda Kirby is involved in the scheduling of a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Meeting Scheduling
events.description: A meeting is being scheduled with Jeffrey Epstein, with discussions about changing the time from 10 AM to either 12 PM or 1 PM.

keyFacts: Lesley Groff is attempting to reschedule a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein.
Amanda Kirby is involved in confirming the availability of other attendees for the meeting.
The original meeting time was set for 10 AM on September 6, 2013.
